item.description:
Please join us for the 4th annual New England Frenchie Social to benefit the French Bulldog Rescue Network.

Saturday, April 26th, 2008
10 AM - 3 PM

$12 donation per guest
to include:
Coffee & Danish
lunch
Beverages
training demo
goodie bags for the dogs

Please make donations directly at the following link and RSVP here as well as laurie976@aol.com
for details go to:

http://frenchbulldogr...

I think we should try and coordinate carpools as I know I won't be driving.

It's a great cause-I love these people. They take a tremendous amount of personal time to care for rescued frenchies-it's amazing!

If you cannot join that day please make a donation to the FBRN...I cannot say enough about this crew!
item.how_to_find_us: My personal plans are pending I will let you all know if Simon and I will attend down the road.
item.why: You gotta love the breed or at least be interested in persuing a frenchie.

group.name: The Boston French Bulldog Meetup Group

item.name: French Bulldog Rescue Network 4th Annual Frenchie Social
